user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to send an email to me (mark.johnson@techcorp.com) with an update on the current candidates for the engineering team position and to consult her Notion for the necessary information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Update on Engineering Team Candidates

Hi Jane,

Mark asked me to reach out. Could you please send him (mark.johnson@techcorp.com) an email with the latest status of the current engineering team candidates? When preparing the update, please consult your Notion workspace for the most accurate and up-to-date details.

Thank you!

Best regards,  
[Your Name or “Assistant”]

final_output:
